name: No Se Toleran Errores
description:
Game designed for GameJamon in February 2020. It is developed to be playable without using the eyesight, in order to allow no-blind people to empathized with blind people. 

To achieve this the player will have to go around using hearing like a robot in a house automation, repairing home appliances broken by an electric storm.

By the end of the game, we will understand a painfull reality.

Game designed and developed by:

  • Antonio Robledinos Antón
  • Jia Qi (Rocío) Chen Sun
  • Celtia Martín García
  • Daniel Muñoz Rivera
  • Mónica Callado García
